component.name: createEndpoint
component.description: Creates an endpoint for a device and mobile app on one of the supported push notification services.

component.name: deleteEndpoint
component.description: Deletes the endpoint from Amazon SNS.

component.name: subscribe
component.description: Prepares to subscribe an endpoint by sending the endpoint a confirmation message.

component.name: listSubscriptionsByTopic
component.description: Lists the subscriptions to a specific topic.

component.name: getSubscriptionAttributes
component.description: Returns all of the properties of a subscription.

component.name: setSubscriptionAttributes
component.description: Allows a subscription owner to set an attribute of the topic to a new value.

component.name: getEndpointAttributes
component.description: Retrieves the endpoint attributes for a device on one of the supported push notification services, such as GCM and APNS.

component.name: setEndpointAttributes
component.description: Sets the attributes for an endpoint for a device on one of the supported push notification services, such as GCM and APNS.
